overview: Prague – the capital of the Czech Republic and (as all gay porn fans surely know) the home of some of the hottest, horniest twinks ever to grace the world of celluloid! It’s little wonder, then, that so many cock-hungry buddies should head to this wonderful city to enjoy the delights that this ancient city holds, in the hope surely of being a part of the spunk-draining action. Dick Casey, Shane Hirch and the ever-fabulous prince of fresh-faced fornication, Noah Matous, make this one holiday romp that no-one’s ever gonna forget in a hurry!
title: Tour Guide
